如閣下搬遷/已搬遷至歐洲聯盟(「歐盟」)司法管轄區,我們可能需要向閣下提供進一步資料,且閣下可能在歐盟《通用數據保障條例》下享有額外權

我們會不時更新我們的私隱通知,並建議閣下瀏覽本公司網站以了解該私隱通知。該私隱通知可在本公司網站
[https://www.prudential.com.hk/scws/pages/tc/privacy-policy/index.html〕 上查閱。閣下填妥並繼續提交本表格,即表示閣下確認已閱讀並
理解本收集個人資料聲明。
業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其他服務予我們,以使
我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT 服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、
代理、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法
律顧問。

Personal Information Collection Statement 收集個人資料聲明
營銷合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商提供行政、電信、電腦、支付、印刷、第三方獎賞/會員/優惠計劃、醫療/健康/保健相關產品、贖回或其他服務,以使
我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商。
Are you currently a customer in mainland China? 您現在是否是個中國內地客戶?
Yes 是
(If "Yes", please tick below box to agree the following statement. If you disagree with this statement, we may not be able to
process your request / application. 如「是」,請勾選以下選項以同意下列聲明。如您不同意以下聲明,我們可能無法處理您的指示/申請。)
By ticking this box, you agree that as an international group company, in order to provide insurance-related products
or services, we may need to store and process your personal information outside of mainland China. Please refer to
our Privacy Notice (https://www.prudential.com.hk/en/china-personal-information-protection-law/) for more
information.
勾選此項,表示您同意,我們作為國際集團公司,為提供保險相關產品或服務,可能需要在中國內地境外存儲或處理您的個人信息。更多
資訊,請參閱我們的隱私聲明(https://www.prudential.com.hk/tc/china-personal-information-protection-law/)。

Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。

results.title_name_en: Trustee Service with BOCT
results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.content_en:
the new Policyowner is a tax resident of Macau, the TIN is the Macau Identity Card Number.
如新保單持有人為澳門稅務居民,稅務編號是其澳門身份證號碼。
If the new Policyowner is a tax resident of China, the TIN is the China Identity Card Number.
如新保單持有人為中國稅務居民,稅務編號是其中國身份證號碼。
If the new Policyowner is a U.S. citizen, permanent resident ("Green Card" holder), or otherwise a U.S. tax resident, U.S. social security number is equivalent to TIN.
如果新保單持有人為美國公民,永久居民(“綠咭”持有人),或美國稅務居民,稅務編號是其美國社會福利保障號碼。
LAPA/DATTPM (03/22)R
5
DATTPM0105Part 7 第七部分 Revocation and Appointment of Beneficiary(ies)撤銷及委任受益人
1. Once Prudential have accepted your request for appointment of beneficiary(ies), this form will form part of the Policy. Such change will be effective from
the date when you signed this form, whether or not the Life Assured is alive at the time when we endorsed such change. All previous designation of
beneficiary(ies) and trustee(s) under the Policy shall be revoked. All death benefit thereafter shall be paid and allocated to the beneficiary(ies) and / or
trustee(s) listed below in Part 7. 有關受益人委任一經保誠接納,則會成為本保單的一部分。不論受保人當時是否在生,有關更改即於閣下
簽署此表格日期起生效。所有於較早前在本保單下委任的受益人及信託人將被取替。此後,一切身故賠償將根據此表格第七部分所列
之受益人及/或信託人作出支付及分配。
2. The total share for each group of beneficiary(ies) must be 100% (to share equally according to Prudential's guideline unless otherwise stated). H / f /
獲分配的百分比總和必須為100%(如沒有特別聲明,賠償則會按保誠的守則平均分配)
。
3. To appoint secondary beneficiary, primary beneficiary must be appointed in advance. The designation of secondary beneficiary(ies) will only be effective if all
primary beneficiaries are deceased. 如需委任候補受益人,必須先委任基本受益人。候補受益人的委任必須於所有基本受益人身故後方才生效。
4. If the beneficiary is NOT an immediate family member (including spouse, parent, children, siblings, or grandparent) of the life assured, it is a MUST to provide
identity document / passport number of the beneficiary in this form. 如受益人並非受保人之直系親屬(包括配偶 /父母/ 子女/ 兄弟姊妹 /
祖父母),必須於此表格提供受益人之身份證/護照號碼。
5. Financial Consultant cannot be the beneficiary, unless she / he is the immediate family member of life assured. 理財顧問如非受保人的直系親屬,不得
成為受益人。
6. There is no restriction on the age of beneficiary(ies), but payment of benefit to any minors shall be subject to the provisions of the Policy (if applicable).
受益人的年齡不受限制,但向未成年人士支付的利益將受本保單的條款限制(如適用)。
7. If the intended beneficiary is a business entity / trust fund / trust company, it is required to submit along with this form (i) Business Registration number of
the party concerned; and (ii) a copy of Business Registration Certificate or Certificate of Incorporation; and (iii) a copy of latest Annual Return. $02 1FA'S
受益人為一商業實體/信託基金/信託公司,必須連同此表格一併遞交(i)其商業登記號碼,及(i)商業登記證或公司註冊證明書之副本及
(ii) 最新的周年申報表之副本。
8. To name a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation) with over 50% of policy benefit or an amount more than HK$1 Million, a written
declaration signed by the Policyowner should be provided. 如捐贈 50% 以上保單利益或其金額超過一百萬港元予慈善團體,保單持有人必須提供
已簽署書面聲明。
9. If your application of Transfer of Policy Ownership in Part 1 of this form is not accepted by Prudential due to whatever reason, your request for beneficiary
appointment made in this part of the form will not be processed. 若保誠因任何原因未能接納閣下於此表格第一部分的保單權益轉讓申請,閣下
於此表格本部分內的委任受益人要求將不獲處理。

DATTPM0105Part 7 第七部分 Revocation and Appointment of Beneficiary(ies)撤銷及委任受益人
1. Once Prudential have accepted your request for appointment of beneficiary(ies), this form will form part of the Policy. Such change will be effective from
the date when you signed this form, whether or not the Life Assured is alive at the time when we endorsed such change. All previous designation of
beneficiary(ies) and trustee(s) under the Policy shall be revoked. All death benefit thereafter shall be paid and allocated to the beneficiary(ies) and / or
trustee(s) listed below in Part 7. 有關受益人委任一經保誠接納,則會成為本保單的一部分。不論受保人當時是否在生,有關更改即於閣下
簽署此表格日期起生效。所有於較早前在本保單下委任的受益人及信託人將被取替。此後,一切身故賠償將根據此表格第七部分所列
之受益人及/或信託人作出支付及分配。
2. The total share for each group of beneficiary(ies) must be 100% (to share equally according to Prudential's guideline unless otherwise stated). H / f /
獲分配的百分比總和必須為100%(如沒有特別聲明,賠償則會按保誠的守則平均分配)
。
3. To appoint secondary beneficiary, primary beneficiary must be appointed in advance. The designation of secondary beneficiary(ies) will only be effective if all
primary beneficiaries are deceased. 如需委任候補受益人,必須先委任基本受益人。候補受益人的委任必須於所有基本受益人身故後方才生效。
4. If the beneficiary is NOT an immediate family member (including spouse, parent, children, siblings, or grandparent) of the life assured, it is a MUST to provide
identity document / passport number of the beneficiary in this form. 如受益人並非受保人之直系親屬(包括配偶 /父母/ 子女/ 兄弟姊妹 /
祖父母),必須於此表格提供受益人之身份證/護照號碼。
5. Financial Consultant cannot be the beneficiary, unless she / he is the immediate family member of life assured. 理財顧問如非受保人的直系親屬,不得
成為受益人。
6. There is no restriction on the age of beneficiary(ies), but payment of benefit to any minors shall be subject to the provisions of the Policy (if applicable).
受益人的年齡不受限制,但向未成年人士支付的利益將受本保單的條款限制(如適用)。
7. If the intended beneficiary is a business entity / trust fund / trust company, it is required to submit along with this form (i) Business Registration number of
the party concerned; and (ii) a copy of Business Registration Certificate or Certificate of Incorporation; and (iii) a copy of latest Annual Return. $02 1FA'S
受益人為一商業實體/信託基金/信託公司,必須連同此表格一併遞交(i)其商業登記號碼,及(i)商業登記證或公司註冊證明書之副本及
(ii) 最新的周年申報表之副本。
8. To name a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation) with over 50% of policy benefit or an amount more than HK$1 Million, a written
declaration signed by the Policyowner should be provided. 如捐贈 50% 以上保單利益或其金額超過一百萬港元予慈善團體,保單持有人必須提供
已簽署書面聲明。
9. If your application of Transfer of Policy Ownership in Part 1 of this form is not accepted by Prudential due to whatever reason, your request for beneficiary
appointment made in this part of the form will not be processed. 若保誠因任何原因未能接納閣下於此表格第一部分的保單權益轉讓申請,閣下

I, the above-named Payor, hereby confirm and declare to Prudential that:
1. The information provided by me in this Notification Form is true, accurate and can be relied upon by Prudential; and
2. I shall bear all charges imposed both by my bank (i.e. the paying bank) and by Prudential's receiving bank to ensure that the
correct amount of insurance premium is transferred to Prudential's bank account; and
3. I understand and agree that if I fail to provide all necessary information and supporting document(s) required by this
Notification Form to Prudential within 3 months from the date of Prudential's receipt of my TT or Local TT payment, such TT or
Local TT payment will be refunded by Prudential to me net of any bank charges incurred at my expense; and
4. I have only submitted this Notification Form once and have not submitted any duplicated copies of this Notification Form and/or
supporting document(s) to Prudential; and
5. I understand and agree that Prudential reserves the right to be indemnified by me for any loss that it may suffer due to any
misrepresentation, non-disclosure, duplicated notification of TT or Local TT payment, and/or fraud or negligence committed by
me in relation to the TT or Local TT payment as described in this Notification Form .; and
6. I understand and agree that under all circumstances, Prudential shall not be responsible for any losses or costs, or any delay of
premium settlement as a result of or in connection with the use of TT or Local TT payment; and
7. I understand and accept the above Personal Information Collection Statement of Prudential.

二. 本人確定上述資料為真實及準確及可被保誠信賴;及
二. 本人會承擔所有由本人的銀行(即付款銀行),以及由保誠的收款銀行徵收的費用,以確保正確數額的保費已匯款給保誠的銀行賬戶;及
=.
本人明白及同意,如果電匯或本地電匯付款已存於保誠的賬戶超過三個月,但沒有提交有效的電匯及本地電匯繳付保費通知書和所需要的資料,電
滙或本地電匯款項將退還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出;及
四.
本人證實只有提交此通知書及沒有提交任何重複的電匯及本地電匯付款通知書及/或證明文件予保誠;及
五. 本人明白及同意保誠保留向本人全數追討任何因本人在此通知書中的任何失實陳述,不披露,重複的電匯或本地電匯通知,及/或欺詐行為或疏忽而
引致之損失;及
六. 本人明白及同意在任何情況下,保誠將不會就由於使用電匯或本地電匯付款所引致或與之相關的任何損失或費用,或保費延誤而負上任何責任;及
七. 本人明白及接受上述保誠個人資料收集聲明。
Note 備註:
If the TT or Local TT payment has been left standing in Prudential's account for over 3 months and no valid TT and Local TT payment

any bank charges incurred.

Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。

日
Month
月
Year
年

(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)
投保人/保單持有人簽署(如投保人/保單持有
人與受保人同為一人,可免簽署此欄)
Signature of Life Proposed / Life Assured
(who has attained age 18 or above)
受保人簽署(適用於十八歲或以上的受保人)
Signature of Consultant as Witness
顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署
Name 姓名:
Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。

results.title_name_en: Trustee Service with BOCT
results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

I, the above-named Payor, hereby confirm and declare to Prudential that:
1. The information provided by me in this Notification Form is true, accurate and can be relied upon by Prudential; and

correct amount of insurance premium is transferred to Prudential's bank account; and
3. I understand and agree that if I fail to provide all necessary information and supporting document(s) required by this
Notification Form to Prudential within 3 months from the date of Prudential's receipt of my TT or Local TT payment, such TT or
Local TT payment will be refunded by Prudential to me net of any bank charges incurred at my expense; and

supporting document(s) to Prudential; and
5. I understand and agree that Prudential reserves the right to be indemnified by me for any loss that it may suffer due to any
misrepresentation, non-disclosure, duplicated notification of TT or Local TT payment, and/or fraud or negligence committed by

premium settlement as a result of or in connection with the use of TT or Local TT payment; and

本人證實只有提交此通知書及沒有提交任何重複的電匯及本地電匯付款通知書及/或證明文件予保誠;及
五. 本人明白及同意保誠保留向本人全數追討任何因本人在此通知書中的任何失實陳述,不披露,重複的電匯或本地電匯通知,及/或欺詐行為或疏忽而

七. 本人明白及接受上述保誠個人資料收集聲明。

results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.

make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,

Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,

can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our

第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

requirements are not fulfilled. 由於審核此表格需時,理財顧問收到此表格並不代表保誠

11. In any circumstances, a person who is not a party to the above policy (including but not limited to the life assured or the beneficiary) has no right to
enforce any of the terms of the above policy. 任何不是上述保單某一方的人士或實體(包括但不限於受保人或受益人),在任何情況下
均不能強制執行上述保單的任何條款。
00000000
LAPA/DATIOM (02/25)
1/8
DATIOM0201
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch)保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)
Part of Prudential plc (United Kingdom) 保誠集團成員Part 1
Important Facts for Appointment, Change or Removal of Designated Person
第一部分
委任、更改或取消指定人士委任的重要資料
1. (Applicable to Prudential Entrust Multi-Currency Plan only) Before the first policy anniversary, only Incapacity Option - Benefit Payout can be chosen by
policyowner. Starting from the first policy anniversary, policyowner can choose "Incapacity Option - Benefit Payout" or "Incapacity Option - Ownership
Transfer". Policyowner can choose the option by designation of Designated Person under Incapacity Option - Benefit Payout or designation of Designated
Owner under Incapacity Option - Ownership Transfer. While the above policy is in force and before the exercise of the Incapacity Option, policyowner
can apply to us in writing using our prescribed form to change the chosen option, subject to the applicable laws, the applicable administrative rules and
conditions as we set out from time to time as well as our approval in our sole and absolute discretion. The request by policyowner to change the chosen
option shall not be effective until it is accepted and recorded by us. Only either one of the Incapacity Option can be exercised under than Plan. ( 3) }
保誠信守明天多元貨幣計劃)於首個保單周年日之前,保單持有人只可選擇無行為能力選項-保障支付。由首個保單周年日起,保單
持有人可以選擇「無行為能力選項-保障支付」或「無行為能力選項-保單權益轉讓」。保單持有人可以透過指定無行為能力選項-
保障支付下的指定人士或指定無行為能力選項-保單權益轉讓下的指定持有人來作出選擇。於上述保單生效時及於行使無行為能力選
項前,保單持有人可 妥指定的表格更改已選擇的選項,惟必須符合本公司適用及不時公佈之行政規定及細則,及經本公司按獨有的
絕對酌情權下核准。保單持有人更改已選擇選項的要求將由本公司接納及記錄後生效。本計劃只可以行使一個無行為能力選項。
2.
While the above policy is in force, and the policyowner is the life assured, policyowner may appoint a person in advance to receive payment under the
Incapacity Option ("Designated Person") and designate a percentage between 10% and 100% of surrender value before deduction of any outstanding
premium, outstanding loan and interest in advance ("Designated Percentage") by completing and submitting this form to us; While the above policy
is in force, the policyowner may also change or remove the Designated Person, and/or change the Designated Percentage by submitting this form. The
applications for appointment, change or removal of Designated Person, and designation or change of Designated Percentage are subject to the applicable
laws, the applicable administrative rules and conditions as we set out from time to time as well as our approval in our sole and absolute discretion. We
reserve the right to change the administrative rules applicable to the appointment, change or removal of Designated Person, and designation or change
of Designated Percentage from time to time. 於上述保單生效期間,如保單持有人為受保人,保單持有人可填妥及向本公司交回本表格以
預先委任一位人士收取就無行為能力選項下之款項(「指定人士」)及預先設定一個數值為在扣除任何未繳保費、應償還之貸款及
利息前的退保價值之十至一百的百分比(「指定百分比」)。在上述保單生效期間,保單持有人亦可交回本表格以更改或取消指
定人士,及/或更改指定百分比。委任、更改或取消指定人士委任,及設定或更改指定百分比的申請必須符合適用之法例、本公司
適用及不時公佈之行政規定及細則,及經本公司按獨有的絕對酌情權下核准。本公司保留不時更改委任、更改或取消指定人士,及
設定或更改指定百分比的行政規定之權利。
3. Incapacity Option is not applicable to (i) a policy which has been assigned, (ii) business insurance, and (iii) Incapacity Option - Ownership Transfer is
chosen (applicable to Prudential Entrust Multi-Currency Plan only). If the above policy is subsequently assigned after appointment of Designated Person,
the appointment of Designated Person will be revoked and cannot be appointed until assignment is released. 無行為能力選項不適用於(i)已轉讓的
保單;(ii)商業保險;及(ii) 已選擇無行為能力選項-保單權益轉讓(只適用於保誠信守明天多元貨幣計劃)。如果在委任指定人士
後隨後轉讓上述保單,則指定人士的委任將被撤銷,並且不能在轉讓解除前委任指定人士。
4.
If the policyowner is diagnosed as suffering from mental incapacity, terminal illness, coma, loss of independent existence, apallic syndrome, major head
trauma or paralysis ("Covered Diseases") while the above policy is in force, we will, subject to the applicable laws, the applicable administrative rules and
conditions as we set out from time to time as well as our approval in our sole and absolute discretion, pay the Designated Person the payment under
the Incapacity Option in one lump sum, the payable amount under the Incapacity Option is equivalent to the Designated Percentage multiplied by the
surrender value before deduction of any outstanding premium, outstanding loan and interest under the above policy as of the date we approve the claim
under the Incapacity Option , provided that as at the date of the claim approval: 在上述保單生效期間,若保單持有人被診斷為精神上無行為
能力、患有末期疾病、昏迷、失去獨立生活能力、植物人、嚴重頭部創傷或癱瘓(「受保疾病」),於符合適用之法例、本公司適用
